reviews.review_msg: Tbh she's not that bad. I wish the instructions for the group project could be clearer tho. It was confusing. We finished the final exam 3 days ago (April 11) and it was difficult. Idk why someone said they got an A+ before the exam lol. According to the syllabus, the MT worths 25% and the final worths 35%.It's test heavy so yeah ik it's stressful.

The exams were not 60% whoever mentioned that. Dr.King is a great professor because she's so passionate in her field that it's contagious! (Infectious disease pun). midterms, exams, and assignments were all fair and she provides study guides which basically have everything u need to study. She's a very caring professor and 100% recommend her.
Francis is the rudest TA ever. Avoid him at all costs.

Dr. King is a great professor. She posts weekly study guides with questions on that week's lecture materials, as well as articles that dive deeper into the topics. The study guides are extremely crucial to complete. Don't skip them. They aren't for marks but they can be the difference between a pass and a fail.
She never posted the answers of the study guide. Very awkward
Get ready to memorize a lotâ€¦Lecture slides are extremely long and the exams worth 60% of the final grade. Very stressful
solid prof, her exams + assignments r really fair and shes not a bad lecturer, the course content is a bit boring sometimes but overall a really solid prof

Elizabeth makes her lectures interesting but the content is naturally bland. The assignments are interesting, but there are weekly discussion posts or quizzes. Would recommend taking 207 with dr king!

Dr. King has been an amazing professor! She is clear on what she wants you to study in the exams and gives us a specific criteria on what to write in the essays. I would recommend to go to her class in-person and her tutorials because she does not post any lecture recordings and the tutorials gives you a better understanding of the content.

Dr. King was a great prof over the semester. Assignments are clear with examples and midterm and final were fair. Participation was not really "participation" when it came to the quizzes because you needed to get the answers right to get the "participation" marks.
